criteria: Demonstrates understanding of sexual health topics.
Provides support and encouragement to peers in making positive sexual health choices.
Communicates effectively and respectfully when discussing sexual health topics.
descriptions: Shows no understanding of sexual health topics; provides incorrect information.
Displays limited understanding of sexual health topics; struggles to accurately explain concepts.
Shows basic understanding of sexual health topics; explanation may be incomplete or contain minor inaccuracies.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of sexual health topics; explains concepts accurately and completely.
Shows advanced understanding of sexual health topics; explains concepts clearly, accurately, and provides additional relevant details.
Demonstrates expert-level understanding of sexual health topics; provides comprehensive explanations with insightful details and connects concepts effectively.
Does not offer support or encouragement; may promote negative or harmful choices.
Offers limited support or encouragement; may struggle to effectively communicate positive choices.
Provides basic support and encouragement; may not fully address the needs of peers.
Offers consistent support and encouragement; effectively communicates positive choices and provides helpful advice.
Demonstrates strong support and encouragement; effectively communicates positive choices, actively listens to peers, and offers tailored advice.
Provides exceptional support and encouragement; empowers peers to make informed decisions, advocates for positive sexual health practices, and serves as a role model.
Communicates ineffectively or disrespectfully; uses inappropriate language or tone.
Struggles to communicate effectively or respectfully; may use insensitive language.
Communicates adequately but may lack clarity or sensitivity.
Communicates effectively and respectfully; uses appropriate language and tone.
Demonstrates strong communication skills; articulates ideas clearly and respectfully, adapting communication style to different audiences.
Communicates exceptionally well; demonstrates empathy, active listening, and provides thoughtful responses in diverse situations.
